text: Francisco José Cox Huneeus (18 December 1933 - 12 August 2020) was a Chilean archbishop of the Catholic Church.His last name "Huneeus" was from his mother's name. Formally. that completes his name. Informally, the mother's surname is dropped. He was a member of Schoenstatt Movement. He was Bishop of Chillán from 1975 to 1981 and Coadjutor Archbishop of La Serena from 1985 to 1990 and Archbishop there from 1990 to 1997. He resigned following accusations that he had sexual abused young boys. He was born in Santiago de Chile. Cox died on 12 August 2020 in Santiago de Chile, aged 86.A los 86 anos murió Francisco José Cox, quien fue expulsado del sacerdozio por abusos sexuales ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Roman Catholic archbishops Category:Chilean Roman Catholic bishops Category:People from Santiago Category:People accused of child sexual abuse
title: Francisco José Cox
